thag10.5:1.1: Filled with different kinds of dirt,
thag10.5:1.4: a huge boil, a bad wound,
thag10.5:3.3: clothed in a jacket of skin,
thag10.5:4.1: Held together by a skeleton of bones,
thag10.5:4.4: due to a complex of many things.
thag10.5:5.1: We set out in the certainty of death,
thag10.5:5.2: in the presence of the King of Death;
thag10.5:5.3: and having discarded the body right here,
thag10.5:5.4: a person goes where he likes.
thag10.5:6.3: this body is sinking in the flood,
thag10.5:6.4: caught in the net of the underlying tendencies.
thag10.5:7.3: stuck to the root of craving,
thag10.5:8.1: that is how the body goes on,
thag10.5:8.2: propelled by the mechanism of deeds.
thag10.5:9.2: who think of this body as theirs,
thag10.5:9.3: swell the horrors of the charnel ground,
thag10.5:10.2: like a snake smeared with dung,
thag10.5:10.4: and realize quenching free of defilements.
